title: r/Maliciouscompliance "You Suck!" "I'm Literally Ranked #1 in the World"
description: r/Maliciouscompliance In today's episode, OP works as an armorer in the US military. OP is good at his job... really, REALLY good at his job. He's so good at his job that the government did an audit and determined that he was the #1 best armorer in the entire US military. So when an egotistical officer tries to fire OP, he happily complies. The military base IMMEDIATELY grinds to a halt without OP managing the armory.
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
